document_data.mainbody:
rinzas was a goblin warrior and a member cult of the Absolute in late 15 century DR.
She had yellow-green skin and wore a crudely-made set of chainmail, adorned with metal plates and animal bones.
In battled, Trinzas wielded a giant greataxe.
In the , a few adventurers and Halsin, the archdruid of the Emerald Grove, attempted to infiltrate the cults fortress, the Shattered Sanctum. Trinzas fellow cultists managed to capture the druid, and turned away the adventurers that accompanied him. Afterwards, Trinzas and other cult warriors remained on high alert.
